name: Lion
description: A large cat with tan fur. Males have a magnificent mane. They are found on Lethinil, in the hot grasslands of the south. Some view them as dangers to their livestock and try to exterminate them.

0.name: Bite
0.description: The lion bites an adjacent target.

1.name: Claw Swipe
1.description: The lion swipes at an adjacent target. If the target is Large or smaller, it must also make a MGT check against the lion to remain standing or else fall prone.
